title: The Best TV Shows of 2020
description:
Chris and Andy are joined by Sam Esmail to talk about the state of tv in 2020 (1:00) and some of their favorite shows of the year, including 'The Mandalorian,' 'Love Life,' 'ZeroZeroZero,' 'I May Destroy You,' and 'Better Call Saul' (20:47).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Sam Esmail
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
